page.title: 06LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS 2
page.content: MOOR PARK MANSION was built for James, Duke of Monmouth in 1678-9 and reconstructed in the Palladian style in 1720. It is now owned by Three Rivers Council and they lease it to the Moor Park Golf Club for their Clubhouse.During the Second World War it was the Headquarters of the 1st. British Airborne Corps where the Arnhem Raid was planned. There are three golf courses (one of which is municipal).For many years it has been tthe site of the Bob Hope Golf Tournament. In Rickmansworth there is a 19th. century Baptist Church (with interesting Wayside Pulpit messages) and a Roman Catholic Church. The Methodist Church (with stained glass windows) was pulled down last year and replaced by offices. The nearest Mosque is being built in Slough.
